title: swogerino
author: swogerino
content: I am mostly a slot lover but lately the heavy losses I have been getting there from absolutely all the providers got me such a sorrow that I decided to quit slots for some days and try sport betting,I choose most likely two kind of bets, nr 1 both teams to score and nr 2 draw no bet and I think the results have impressed me,I have been having much more wins that lost games,was this just plain luck or I know a thing or two about football also and not only about slot machines.Some images of such bets I placed low amounts in Litecoin during such days.Should I continue here where my balance only grows or get back to slot machines?One thing is sure,these winnings here has grayed out a lot my love for slots.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: swogerino on January 17, 2023, 09:27:53 PMI have been having much more wins that lost games,was this just plain luck or I know a thing or two about football also and not only about slot machines.Just bet little because the more you are into it, the more likely you can lose. Everything is still luck. Know that good luck in the beginning is even dangerous and deceiving.Quote from: swogerino on January 17, 2023, 09:27:53 PMShould I continue here where my balance only grows or get back to slot machines?One thing is sure,these winnings here has grayed out a lot my love for slots.This question can best be answered by you.Do the one you love doing, either for money or for pleasure, but do not be addicted or gamble more than necessary. Do not see gambling as a way of having income.

comments.author: swogerino

Everything is still luck.Quote from: swogerino on January 17, 2023, 09:27:53 PMShould I continue here where my balance only grows or get back to slot machines?One thing is sure,these winnings here has grayed out a lot my love for slots.This question can best be answered by you.Do the one you love doing, either for money or for pleasure, but do not be addicted or gamble more than necessary.There is one big problem for me personally,although I am winning constantly in sport betting so far which I also rate as plain luck until I keep doing this like for 6 months with the same results,then it is clearly skill but I highly doubt this and I don't even love soccer as much as I love slots despite the damage that they have inflicted to me in the long run but I am decided to quit them and this so far looks like the best way,I don't feel like the urge to play slots when I am reading online for different tips and ideas for daily bets in soccer (yes I keep reading a lot during the day through my mobile at my work) and thus the results have been good.I just need to try this for up until end of January but I will never feel the thrill here as I have felt long ago now in the pandemic year of 2020 where x2000-x3000 wins in slot machines for me were common.Hopefully I can stand with sport betting as it needs less money and I can play longer here.

comments.author: rhomelmabini
comments.body: Quote from: swogerino on January 17, 2023, 09:27:53 PMShould I continue here where my balance only grows or get back to slot machines?One thing is sure,these winnings here has grayed out a lot my love for slots.Was the payout in BTC? I think you should continue to keep betting, you've got the skill to be a profitable in sports betting. Slots are purely luck based and sometimes it gets boring if you just play on it regularly. Maybe you should do slot for just a short amount of time just to past the time since sports betting take quite some time before the results.

comments.author: Yatsan
comments.body: Quote from: swogerino on January 17, 2023, 09:27:53 PMShould I continue here where my balance only grows or get back to slot machines?One thing is sure,these winnings here has grayed out a lot my love for slots.Well it is a good thing that you are seeking alternatives on the game you are playing often simply because you won't win in a consistent manner to any kind of gambling you engage yourself with as long as it is gambling. I am also into sportsbetting but I was doing dice games before. The thing I liked about sportsbetting is somehow allowing the players to minimize the tendency of losing through analyzing the teams I am interested with; past matches, players'performance and such. To answer the question whether you should go back to slots, that is really on you as @Oshosondy have said. One's preference is the answer. We are all aiming to win in this industry so choose what would push you near that purpose. You may also alternate from the two categories if you enjoy both.

comments.author: Ryker1
comments.body: Quote from: swogerino on January 17, 2023, 09:27:53 PM[snip]Should I continue here where my balance only grows or get back to slot machines?One thing is sure,these winnings here has grayed out a lot my love for slots.Stay there as of now.That is why I never played based on luck games because it is hard to fight against house edge which we know they are always in a winning position. Sports betting has a chance that your winning will increase through your skills because this is not pure luck, but perhaps this was a coincidence that you have won, if you have a little knowledge of sports, just do research on it to increase your chances of winning. Slot machines are easy money, you don't have to wait for the result but it has a high risk to become addicted if you cannot manage yourself, it is up to you to know where to choose, and you will perhaps receive decent advice to our fellow gamblers here.

comments.author: danherbias07
comments.body: Quote from: swogerino on January 17, 2023, 10:03:15 PMThe problem is that I don't love at all to play sport betting and I am in a huge love with slot machines because of the thrill of the instant wins there,I think I have lost my patience and I want money to win instantly and this is a really bad and dangerous thing to do so I am sticking to sport betting despite not loving it,kinda like a marriage with a woman you don't love  .Funny but true.   You came up with the perfect answer. Out of curiosity, do you bet on football by tailing another gambler or do you just bet according to favorites and odds? I mean, because you said you don't love the sport and yet you keep on betting on it. I am curious because I am trying to dig deep on knowing more about football as I have also witnessed a lot of gamblers win in the said sport. Plus, it's a worldwide game so I want to know why the hype about it is so large that almost every sports lover does talk about it.It will be a good addition to both my hobby of analyzing games and my gambling habit. Congratulations though, that's some big bets you got there, perhaps sticking with it will be the best choice, and lesser slots.

comments.author: harizen
comments.body: With the chosen odds you have bet on, I would say that you are currently in a good run.What's next? Risks more and increase your bet. Believe me, don't settle on that low amount for long if your strategy is working well. Try to set a decent budget "at risk". If you lose it, then do the usual moving-on process. If you won it, then keep it up.Then, later on, come back to what you really preferred to play, slot machines.

comments.author: ralle14
comments.body: I'd say keep on going because it's not that easy to get several wins in a row within a few days so you might as well take advantage of the streak you have right now and then stop or maybe take a break if you think your streak is about to end. That's what I would do if i'm the one doing the experiment but I already lost most of my interest in casino games, I still play them once in a while but the level of enjoyment doesn't hit the same for me anymore after switching to sports betting.

comments.author: Wexnident
comments.body: Still up to you really. It doesn't seem like you're forcing yourself to gamble in sports so I think it should be fine to continue, it can even come as a sort of breather since as you've said, you started hating on slots quite a bit. Now I have no idea why you chose sports though, I'd honestly have gone to other casino-type games instead if I were in your place, but to each their own. If soccer starts to turn tedious maybe try out other types of sports if you still don't wanna go back to slots. It's honestly more fun imo even given the time it takes for each match to happen, watching the match itself is part of the fun after all.

comments.author: Reatim
comments.body: Quote from: swogerino on January 17, 2023, 09:27:53 PMShould I continue here where my balance only grows or get back to slot machines?One thing is sure,these winnings here has grayed out a lot my love for slots.If you are enjoying the game? then why not continue since you still have the funds to push through ? but of course those two gambling has big difference as slot is Luck Base and soccer is knowledge and experience combination (skill we can call) so try to configure on your own what you wanted and then decide, nit just because you are experimenting but because this is your money that will be gone in time.

comments.author: joeperry
comments.body: If you're up for entertainment and I think that's what you're seeking then go the game you love and where you can enjoy every bit of your balance. Though if you wanted to increase your bankroll you should continue your sports betting. Or you can do at the same time, place bet in the soccer and if you win, take a portion of your winnings allocated to your slot game, that's actually up to you what your goal really is.By the way, those was a good wins. I think you really are good in football sports betting, I wish you luck!

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Quote from: swogerino on January 17, 2023, 09:27:53 PMShould I continue here where my balance only grows or get back to slot machines?One thing is sure,these winnings here has grayed out a lot my love for slots.All the answers are in you, mate. But if you feel more fortunate to play in soccer betting, then you should continue soccer betting. BTW, in the past, I was a bettor who bet on football matches. But at one time, when I tried to play slots, somehow I felt I was luckier. And because of that, I lowered my betting percentage on soccer betting. maybe the percentage is 30% (soccer betting) - 70% (slots), I mean, believe me, you'll not be able to leave your old habit of playing slots, just lower the intensity.

Or else take your profit and leave before you make huge losses. Always remember, in the long run, the casino is the winner, not you!) slots and sports betting? Those are two different kind of gambling experience. Sports betting requires patience as it is a long term thing like having to do analysis and stuffs, and you have to always wait for the results. On other hand, slots are instant - you win or you lose.

comments.author: ethereumhunter
comments.body: Slot games require luck, so it's only natural that you experience big losses and that doesn't only happen to you but also to many people. And it seems that once you move on to play in sports betting, you get more luck than slot games because I see you get a lot of wins from sports betting. Maybe you will be able to get even more wins if you continue betting on sports betting but keep betting on games you know so that will increase your chances of winning. And I agree to bet a small amount so the loss won't be big.

comments.author: taufik123
comments.body: Slots give you a lot to lose if you can't manage your bets, I don't do that often because I know I can't stay in slots and always run out in the end.Football betting seems right for you if you know about soccer, because soccer betting also requires research on the players so you know the rhythm of the game. it's more like an analysis of the upcoming match.Quote from: adzino on January 18, 2023, 02:49:53 AMWhy not continue gambling on both (I mean if you want to continue gambling. Or else take your profit and leave before you make huge losses. -snip-This will be difficult when there are lots of profits, some gamblers don't want to stop and keep betting until in the end the profits will be taken back by the casino. The psychology of gambling will greatly affect, not only crypto trading. The more greedy when making gambling bets, the more risky it is to lose bigger and run out.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: I would say you should continue with the sport betting since you have been experiencing some wins lately. It's not easy to just be winning on a streak. But also you should visit the slot and make some bets there (if you wish to, you can completely ignore it if you feel the need to) but not as much as you do in the past. If you know you can balance both the sport and slot betting then that will be okay, but you should be conscious of your wagers so as not to start spending more than your usual.

comments.body: Quote from: swogerino on January 17, 2023, 09:27:53 PMShould I continue here where my balance only grows or get back to slot machines?One thing is sure,these winnings here has grayed out a lot my love for slots.The difference in principle is that with sports betting you could make a profit in the long run, but it is difficult and you have to put a lot of study and effort into it. Only if you use small funds more often why not try it on parlay maybe you can produce something big.
